name: Blowing Ahead
description:
There is nowhere to go other than moving forward. Use the elemental to get across platforms to the Gate of Heaven with your decapitated head. No matter how long it takes, the gate will be sitting there waiting for you to enter.

Controls-

Q/E - Move Back & Forward

O/P- Move Left or Right

W - Jump

Credit-

Development Duo-

Antonio Garcia

Christopher Rayos
